languages.text: {n}Кибелла вытягивает палец, увенчанный металлическим когтем, в сторону преподобного Адальберта.{/n} "Гадание указало, что ты стоишь подле врага — Немезита. Молви правду пред лицом Домин и Неумирающего".

{n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла вытягивает палец, увенчанный металлическим когтем, в сторону преподобного Адальберта.{/n} "Гадание указало, что ты стоишь подле врага — Немезита. Молви правду пред лицом Домин и Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Reverend Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before Enim and the Undying One."

{n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

{n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah richtet einen mit einer metallenen Klaue besetzten Finger auf Konfessor Adalbert.{/n} "Die Prophetie hat offenbart, dass Ihr an der Seite des Feindes Nemesit steht. Sagt vor {mf|dem|der} Domin und dem Todlosen nichts als die Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah richtet einen mit einer metallenen Klaue besetzten Finger auf Konfessor Adalbert.{/n} "Die Prophetie hat offenbart, dass Ihr an der Seite des Feindes Nemesit steht. Sagt vor {mf|dem|der} Domin und dem Todlosen nichts als die Wahrheit."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah extiende un dedo coronado por una garra metálica en dirección al confesor Adalbert.{/n} «La adivinación me ha revelado que usted colabora con el enemigo, Nemesitio. Le conmino a decir la verdad en presencia {mf|del|de la} Domin y del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah extiende un dedo coronado por una garra metálica en dirección al confesor Adalbert.{/n} «La adivinación me ha revelado que usted colabora con el enemigo, Nemesitio. Le conmino a decir la verdad en presencia {mf|del|de la} Domin y del Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}キベラはアダルバート司祭に向かって、金属の爪のついた指を伸ばした。{/n}「ディビネーションの結果、あなたが敵であるネメサイト側の人間だと分かったわ。ドミンと不死の者の前で真実のみを語りなさい」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはアダルバート司祭に向かって、金属の爪のついた指を伸ばした。{/n}「ディビネーションの結果、あなたが敵であるネメサイト側の人間だと分かったわ。ドミンと不死の者の前で真実のみを語りなさい」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈伸出一根手指，手指上的金属爪直直地指着告解神父阿达伯特。{/n}“占卜让我看到了真相，我看到你站在我们的敌人涅墨斯特身边。如今你站在秘者与不死之神面前，你只能说真话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈伸出一根手指，手指上的金属爪直直地指着告解神父阿达伯特。{/n}“占卜让我看到了真相，我看到你站在我们的敌人涅墨斯特身边。如今你站在秘者与不死之神面前，你只能说真话。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah tend un doigt serti d'une griffe de métal en direction du confesseur Adalbert.{/n} « Le tarot divinatoire vous a désigné comme le complice de notre ennemi Némésite. Dites la vérité, et rien que la vérité, devant {mf|le|la} Domin et l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah tend un doigt serti d'une griffe de métal en direction du confesseur Adalbert.{/n} « Le tarot divinatoire vous a désigné comme le complice de notre ennemi Némésite. Dites la vérité, et rien que la vérité, devant {mf|le|la} Domin et l'Immortel. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ucunda metal bir pençe bulunan parmağını Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert'e doğru uzatıyor.{/n} "Kehanet, Nemezit denen düşmanımızın yanında yer aldığını açığa çıkardı. Domin'in ve Ölmeyen'in huzurunda yalnızca doğruları konuş."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah extends a finger topped with a metal claw toward Confessor Adalbert.{/n} "The divination has revealed that you stand beside the enemy Nemesite. Speak only the truth before the Domin and the Undying One."
